Title: Blog
Subtitle: Thoughts, tutorials, and insights about web development and technology.

Posts.Title: Mastering React Hooks
Posts.Excerpt: A deep dive into React Hooks, covering useState, useEffect, useContext, and custom hooks with practical examples and performance optimization tips.

Posts.Title: The Future of Frontend Development
Posts.Excerpt: An exploration of upcoming trends and technologies that will shape the future of frontend development, including WebAssembly, CSS features, and JavaScript frameworks.

Posts.Title: Building Scalable APIs with Node.js
Posts.Excerpt: A comprehensive guide to building robust, scalable, and maintainable APIs using Node.js, Express, and best practices for authentication, error handling, and performance.

Posts.Title: Effective State Management in React Applications
Posts.Excerpt: Comparing different state management approaches in React, from Context API and Redux to Recoil and Zustand, with guidelines on choosing the right solution for your project.

Posts.Title: Serverless Architecture: Benefits and Limitations
Posts.Excerpt: An in-depth look at serverless architecture, its benefits for scalability and cost optimization, as well as potential limitations and when to consider alternative approaches.

Posts.Title: Accessibility in Web Development
Posts.Excerpt: Best practices for creating accessible websites that work for everyone, including keyboard navigation, screen reader support, and ARIA attributes.

Posts.Title: Optimizing Website Performance
Posts.Excerpt: Strategies and techniques for improving website performance, including image optimization, code splitting, lazy loading, and caching mechanisms.

Posts.Title: From Junior to Senior Developer: A Career Roadmap
Posts.Excerpt: A guide on advancing your career from junior to senior developer, covering technical skills, soft skills, mentorship, and continuous learning strategies.

Posts.Title: TypeScript Best Practices for Large Projects
Posts.Excerpt: Essential TypeScript patterns and best practices for maintaining large-scale applications, including type definitions, interfaces vs. types, and advanced utility types.
